author: Patrick Cc:
description:
Andy Dick’s career is one of the most bizarre and disturbing downward spirals in Hollywood history. Decades of addiction, arrests, and repeated allegations of misconduct that the industry continually ignored. This video breaks down how Andy Dick kept getting chances, who enabled him along the way, and why his chaos was treated as entertainment for far too long.
